root: ^EnemyNPC2: Perseus, Perseus! After you kill that bitch, could you sign my forehead?
^EnemyNPC1: Bro, tell her who sent us! That’ll scare her out of whatever hole she’s hiding in!
^Perseus: Oh, right! Zeus and the Olympians have sent me for your head!
^Euryale: Wow, I think one of that kid's goons just saved a drop of his sweat.
^Stheno: Look at that SOB stomping around in his little helmet. That’s the lightning hoe’s kid alright. Let’s end him.
^Medusa: Stheno. Euryale. He’s an idiot but the gods are on his side. What if something happens? It’s my problem, I’ll deal with it.
^Stheno: Give me a break with all that cheesy martyr shit.
^Euryale: You know… maybe she’s right. Why should we play the gods’ game?
^Typhon: Duusa, listen to me! We’re your gift as much as your curse! I’ll show you. Quick, left click and we’ll carry you!
^Typhon: ...And press SPACE if you want us to let you go.
^Typhon: Right click on those bastards to swallow them whole!
^Typhon: Now, the greatest of your gifts...press Q and any mortal enemy will turn to stone!
